name: Orange ButterPhant
description:
This here is a Butterphant.
Butterfly + Elephant = Butterphant!
I came up with this design when i was trying to think of designs for my first tattoo. Instead i came up with an awesome brooch idea, so now everyone can enjoy this crazy hybrid creature!!!

This brooch has been hand-stitched just for you with love and care in my little Melbourne living-room.

It measures 3 inches in height
And 5.5 inches in width.
(Based on approximations measured between the widest and highest points)

This brooch is fitted with a secure metal clasp so it can be worn safely on your shirt, dress, scarf, hat, pocket, bag or even on the curtains or cushions around your home!

Each brooch comes packaged on a lovely vintage swap card. Help save the environment without the use of new packaging - Reduce, Reuse, Recycle!
(Plus they look extra cute)

Most of my designs can be made in different colour variations. Email me for more info :)

All work and images © Candy Bandit Brooches 2010, All rights reserved.

name: Warrior Fox Face Necklace
description:
This necklace is my favourite!

The Fox is made from felt. It is very colourful & detailed & sure to be a statement piece. I have contrasted black & cream with brighter colours for a beautiful effect.
It features a lovely green tone aluminium chain which goes really well with the details on the fox's face.
He is like no other!

It is very light weight and sits nicely positioned on your sternum. It would match neutral colours AND bright colours, plain outfits AND busy outfits!

This necklace has been hand-stitched just for you with love and care in my little Melbourne living-room.

Measurements;
Felt Fox Pendant - 3.2 inch Width/4.4 inch Height
Chain Length - 24inch
(Based on approximations measured between the widest and highest points)

This necklace is fitted with a secure aluminium chain so it can be worn safely with your favourite outfit. The chain has been stitched into the back of the necklace to minimise the chance of breakage, so it is very strong! 

Most of my designs can be made in different colour variations. Email me for more info :)

All work and images © Candy Bandit Brooches 2010, All rights reserved.

name: Red Rose Brooch
description:
This brooch is rather outstanding. It really completes your oufit, and just looks amazing.
It is very detailed, each petal is individually cut & sewn in to create a 3D look. Black fabric paint has then been used to add shading detail.

This brooch has been hand-stitched just for you with love and care in my little Melbourne living-room.

It measures 2.8 inches in height
And 2.3 inches in width.
(Based on approximations measured between the widest and highest points)

This brooch is fitted with a secure metal clasp (pictured above) so it can be worn safely on your shirt, dress, scarf, hat, pocket, bag or even on the curtains or cushions around your home!

Each brooch comes packaged on a lovely vintage swap card. Help save the environment without the use of new packaging - Reduce, Reuse, Recycle!
(Plus they look extra cute)

Most of my designs can be made in different colour variations. Email me for more info :)

All work and images © Candy Bandit Brooches 2010, All rights reserved.

name: White Fawn Brooch
description:
This Little Fawn brooch is simple, bold, beautiful, sweet & an asset to any outfit! Made from White felt with simple black fabric paint detail, he will match anything!!

It measures 3 inches in height
And 2.5 inches in width.

name: Purple Robot-Monster Brooch
description:
This little felt fellow may look a bit goofy, but i assure you, he knows what he's doing when it comes to making your clothes look good!

This brooch has been hand-stitched just for you with love and care in my little Melbourne living-room.

It measures 1.9 inches in height
And 1 inch in width.
(Based on approximations measured between the widest and highest points)
